import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Header, Icon, Segment, Grid, Modal, Button, Embed } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import Vikings from '../Video/Vikings.mp4'; import Got from '../Video/got.mp4'; import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' const HeaderPart = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const [dimmer, setDimmer] = useState(''); const show = (dimmer) => { setOpen(true); } const close = () => { setOpen(false); } return ( 11 Show Modal} closeIcon> Select a Photo
